max_memory: 2GB max / PC2-5300 667MHz DDR2 or PC3-10600 1333MHz DDR3
processor_info: Intel Atom Processor N450/N455 with single-core, DMI (Direct Media Interface), integrated DDR2/DDR3 memory controller (up to 667MHz), Hyper-Threading Technology, and 512KB L2 cache
additional_features: 5-in-1 reader (MultiMedia Card, Memory Stick, Memory Stick PRO, Secure Digital Card, xD-Picture Card)
